channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
In my NPChandler, I have this
[code]if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 6261) npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 6154;[/code]
Which is Sergeant StrongStack and 6154 is his attack ID (I tested myself), however even with that added he still attacks the incorrect way (Where his body is stretched everywhere). How could I fix this?
My other question involves interfaces, how could I go about using a sendframe to make items appear in the Drop Party Chest interface, sort of how:
[code]c.sendFrame34(6963, item1, 0, 1);[/code] makes item appear in the Clue Scroll interface.

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @H_tler H¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

How would I go about that?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @H_tler H¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

This is the one Lin gave me for my other interface,

int item1 = Item.randomClue(); int item2 = Item.randomClue(); c.addItem(item1, 1); c.addItem(item2, 1); c.sendFrame34(6963, item1, 0, 1); c.sendFrame34(6963, item2, 1, 1); c.sendFrame34(6963, -1, 2, 1); c.sendFrame34(6963, -1, 3, -1); c.deleteItem(2678, 1); c.showInterface(6960);

How would I make it work with the 2156 interface, I mean I know to change 6960 to 21556, but how could I make the sendframes work to show the item.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @H_tler H¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

How would I make it ‘Drawn On’?

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

First Question: I’m assuming it’s because you don’t have the animation added into the client correctly, does your client have all the right animations for the server?

Read full topic
